languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас остается безучастным к происходящему. Он словно не замечает ни ужасающее убранство залы, ни ран на своем истерзанном теле, ни окруживших вас врагов. Его взгляд затуманен и то и дело обращается к Маражаю — и, не найдя ответа, возвращается блуждать по лицам присутствующих.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ахиллеас остается безучастным к происходящему. Он словно не замечает ни ужасающее убранство залы, ни ран на своем истерзанном теле, ни окруживших вас врагов. Его взгляд затуманен и то и дело обращается к Маражаю — и, не найдя ответа, возвращается блуждать по лицам присутствующих.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: {n}Achilleas remains indifferent to what is going on. It is as though he does not notice the terrifying decor of the hall, or the wounds on his tortured body, or the enemies surrounding you. His clouded gaze seeks out Marazhai over and over, and, failing to find any response there, it roves from one face to another.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас остается безучастным к происходящему. Он словно не замечает ни ужасающее убранство залы, ни ран на своем истерзанном теле, ни окруживших вас врагов. Его взгляд затуманен и то и дело обращается к Маражаю — и, не найдя ответа, возвращается блуждать по лицам присутствующих.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas remains indifferent to what is going on. It is as though he does not notice the terrifying decorations or the wounds on his tortured body, or the enemies that surround you. His gaze is clouded and keeps turning to Marazhai, but fails to find purchase and keeps wandering from one face to another.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯对目前发生的事情依然无动于衷，仿佛既没有注意到大厅里恐怖的装饰，也没有注意到他残破躯体上的无数伤口，更没有注意到你身边的那些敌人。他浑浊的目光一遍又一遍地寻找着玛拉斋，但玛拉斋却没有任何回应，于是他又将目光游移到了其他人身上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas remains indifferent to what is going on. It is as though he does not notice the terrifying decor of the hall, or the wounds on his tortured body, or the enemies surrounding you. His clouded gaze seeks out Marazhai over and over, and, failing to find any response there, it roves from one face to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯对目前发生的事情依然无动于衷，仿佛既没有注意到大厅里恐怖的装饰，也没有注意到他残破躯体上的无数伤口，更没有注意到你身边的那些敌人。他浑浊的目光一遍又一遍地寻找着玛拉斋，但玛拉斋却没有任何回应，于是他又将目光游移到了其他人身上。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは周囲の状況に対して無関心のようだ。まるで広間の恐ろしい装飾や、自分の身体の傷や、周りを囲む敵に気づいていないかのようだった。彼の曇った視線は何度もマラズハイを見たが、彼から何も反応が得られないことに気づくと他の顔へ視線を泳がせた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas remains indifferent to what is going on. It is as though he does not notice the terrifying decor of the hall, or the wounds on his tortured body, or the enemies surrounding you. His clouded gaze seeks out Marazhai over and over, and, failing to find any response there, it roves from one face to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは周囲の状況に対して無関心のようだ。まるで広間の恐ろしい装飾や、自分の身体の傷や、周りを囲む敵に気づいていないかのようだった。彼の曇った視線は何度もマラズハイを見たが、彼から何も反応が得られないことに気づくと他の顔へ視線を泳がせた。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: {n}Achilleas se muestra indiferente a los acontecimientos. Es como si no se diera cuenta de la aterradora decoración de la sala, de las heridas de su cuerpo torturado ni de los enemigos que os rodean. Su mirada confusa no deja de buscar a Marazhai, y, al no encontrar respuesta en él, pasa de un rostro a otro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas remains indifferent to what is going on. It is as though he does not notice the terrifying decor of the hall, or the wounds on his tortured body, or the enemies surrounding you. His clouded gaze seeks out Marazhai over and over, and, failing to find any response there, it roves from one face to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas se muestra indiferente a los acontecimientos. Es como si no se diera cuenta de la aterradora decoración de la sala, de las heridas de su cuerpo torturado ni de los enemigos que os rodean. Su mirada confusa no deja de buscar a Marazhai, y, al no encontrar respuesta en él, pasa de un rostro a otro.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: {n}Achilleas est totalement indifférent à ce qui se passe autour de lui, comme s'il n'avait pas remarqué le décor terrifiant, l'état pitoyable de son propre corps torturé ou les ennemis qui vous entourent. Son regard voilé cherche désespérément celui de Marazhai, en vain. À défaut, il pose les yeux tour à tour sur chacune des personnes présentes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas remains indifferent to what is going on. It is as though he does not notice the terrifying decor of the hall, or the wounds on his tortured body, or the enemies surrounding you. His clouded gaze seeks out Marazhai over and over, and, failing to find any response there, it roves from one face to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas est totalement indifférent à ce qui se passe autour de lui, comme s'il n'avait pas remarqué le décor terrifiant, l'état pitoyable de son propre corps torturé ou les ennemis qui vous entourent. Son regard voilé cherche désespérément celui de Marazhai, en vain. À défaut, il pose les yeux tour à tour sur chacune des personnes présentes.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: {n}Achilleas nimmt die Vorgänge teilnahmslos zur Kenntnis. Es wirkt, als würde er die fürchterliche Dekoration der Halle, die Wunden an seinem gepeinigten Körper und die Feinde um dich herum gar nicht wahrnehmen. Sein trüber Blick erfasst immer wieder Marazhai, und als dort keine Reaktion erfolgt, mustert er ein Gesicht nach dem anderen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas remains indifferent to what is going on. It is as though he does not notice the terrifying decor of the hall, or the wounds on his tortured body, or the enemies surrounding you. His clouded gaze seeks out Marazhai over and over, and, failing to find any response there, it roves from one face to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas nimmt die Vorgänge teilnahmslos zur Kenntnis. Es wirkt, als würde er die fürchterliche Dekoration der Halle, die Wunden an seinem gepeinigten Körper und die Feinde um dich herum gar nicht wahrnehmen. Sein trüber Blick erfasst immer wieder Marazhai, und als dort keine Reaktion erfolgt, mustert er ein Gesicht nach dem anderen.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas

languages.text: {n}Achilleas'ın olan bitenle alakası yok gibi görünüyor. Salonun dehşet verici dekorunu, işkence görmüş bedenindeki yaraları veya etrafını sarmış düşmanları fark etmiyor gibi. Bulutlu bakışları tekrar tekrar Marazhai'ı bulmaya çalışıyor, herhangi bir karşılık göremeyince de bir yüzden diğerine atlamayı sürdürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas remains indifferent to what is going on. It is as though he does not notice the terrifying decor of the hall, or the wounds on his tortured body, or the enemies surrounding you. His clouded gaze seeks out Marazhai over and over, and, failing to find any response there, it roves from one face to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas'ın olan bitenle alakası yok gibi görünüyor. Salonun dehşet verici dekorunu veya işkence görmüş bedenindeki yaraları veya etrafını sarmış düşmanları fark etmiyor gibi âdeta. Bulutlu bakışları tekrar tekrar Marazhai'ı bulmaya çalışıyor ve herhangi bir karşılık göremeyince bir yüzden diğerine atlamayı sürdürüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Ahileas
